desc: We are dedicated to deliver you transcendental knowledge based on the ancient Vaishnava tradition and all the items you need to take your first steps on the path of bhakti or to enhance your already existing practice.

layout.text: The Swami on….Life in a Faltering World
Here is your chance to experience the world through the eyes of someone who has spent his life practising bhakti-yoga, the yoga of pure love and devotion, and learn to attain real happiness.
